page.title: 10 Occupations
page.content: {Farms}are managed by perhaps 2 men and casual help.{Private homes}for the old like the{Barton}and{Beaumont Court need trained nursing and domestic staff.Village{schools}employ local cooks, cleaners and ancillaries.Part- time men/women bus drivers transport school children, organised by Cornwall Council.Antique/furniture restoration shop employs a boy under the{Youth {Training Scheme}hoping to have a permanent post at the end of the year. {NCC,}a bus firm has closed for economic reasons losing 3 full and 10 part-time workers.There is a 1 man {market garden}for shrubs and a viable {vine yard}here.The 2{village shop/ {post offices}have 4 regular employees. Daughters are encouraged to seek work away from home as teachers,nurses etc. Boys,prior to taking over family interests go to agricultural college.
